Degree.comments: Candidate does not have a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or Economics.

Experience.comments: Candidate has some experience as a business analyst and in data analysis and reporting.

TechnicalSkills.comments: Candidate has some technical skills relevant to the position.

Responsibilities.comments: Candidate has some responsibilities that are relevant to the position.

Certificates.comments: Candidate does not have the required Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP) certificate.

SoftSkills.comments: Candidate has good communication skills and the ability to work in a team.

SummaryComment: The candidate does not meet the degree requirement, but has some relevant experience, technical skills, and soft skills.
